name: Heroism
description: A willing creature you touch is imbued with bravery. Until the spell ends, the creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hit points equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at the start of each of its turns. When the spell ends, the target loses any remaining temporary hit points from this spell.
higherLevelsDescription: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

effects.special: Immune to Frightened condition. Gains Temp HP equal to caster's mod at start of turn.

engineHook.notes: Requires 'Start of Turn' triggers and condition immunity logic.
